page.title: 08TRADE IN THE CLAYBROOKE AREA
page.content:
SHOPPING
Many people in the villages visit the large supermarkets in Hinckley, Rugby, or Lutterworth, weekly or monthly, for their main shopping requirements, making it very difficult for the village shops to survive. However in Claybrooke Magna there is a Post Office/grocers shop and a Newsagents/General Stores. A hairdressers and toy shop have also recently opened in Claybrooke Magna. There are no shops in Claybrooke Parva and only one Brass and Antique Shop in Frolesworth.
